_sText:
__________________________________________
[Update] 4th of May 2007: Final version
Changes:
-Scaled down 0.75, to make rounds faster
-A couple of new textures
-Bugfixes
__________________________________________

Surf_Bathroom; Surf map to please everyone. Or atleast, that's what I was going for. 

Map Features:
-Rats-style, bathroom-themed map.
-Lighting
-3d Skybox
-Ramps fit in with the environment
-90% Custom textures
-Lots of surfing possibilities, with interesting boosters, double halfpipes etc. all looking natural.
-Functional tabs, hairdryers , sinks, breakables and a toilet that actually flushes.

Concept:
-Teams spawn seperately at opposite sides of the room.
-You get to pick one of 7 guns at spawn *new in v2*
-Snipers are available for pick-up all around the map, awp's are more challenging to get to then scouts.
-Going in any sink will tele you into a plumbing-system, spitting you out at a random location (Spawns, Bath, Shower, Sinks, Top, etc.)
-The Toilet becomes a bombzone after 2 minutes.
-No jail, you can safely surf down on the floor, but it can also kill you
-You can safely land on any towel
-There is a place called top, from where you can go just about everywhere using boosters.
-Secrets

This map is all about exploring and fighting; feel free. Do whatever you want. Choose to buy a gun and rush into the enmy, or go eco and surf for a sniper. Have fun surfing around, try stuff, try getting to places in different ways, fuck around on the boosters, or mess with the double halfpipe-cabinet. Both the beginners and skilled surfers can enjoy this.

I put way too many time in this, so you better like it, damnit.
**Changes in V2**
-Changed spawn, no more ubyzone, you get to pick a weapon.
-Removed some stuff
-Fixed not being able to pick up snipers on some servers
-Did a little bit of optimization

-SmOoth
